message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.NE, cs.CL 

This paper is about continual learning, which is a subfield of machine learning. The use of Bayesian models and natural gradients suggests that it may belong to the sub-category of cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also mentions the use of coresets, which are commonly used in computer vision (cs.CV) and natural language processing (cs.CL). Additionally, the paper discusses the retention of knowledge from previous tasks, which is a common problem in artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and neural networks (cs.NE).
